conversations.conversation: A woman wanted 2 hav sex but she dont want it 2 be wit a man she wanted it 2 be special so she went in search of the perfect sex machine she searched 4 a very long time and got tired so she went 2 a resturant 2 eat there she saw a bowl tagged sex frogs she asked d owner of d resturant if it was 4 sale he said yes dat it was so she bought 1 and was given a paper filled wit instructions on wat 2 do so she took it home and did exactly wat d instruction said but notin happened so she called d owner of d sex frogs d owner came over 2 her house and saw dat it was true and said 2 d frog I AM ONLY GONNA SHOW U DIS 1 LAST TIME lol
